page.title: 12THE AVERAGE CHILD AT 10 YRS.
page.content: The average child at 10 years has brown hair and brown eyes.He(or she) weighs 33.52 kilograms and is 144.26 centimetres high.Most children live in a detached house.They watch television every night and some of their favourite hobbies are sports,using the computer,collecting,walking and playing musical instruments(recorder or piano)running,ice-skating and roller skating.Most children have such pets as dog,cat and goldfish.The most popular subjects at school are Art,games,enviromental study and english.
